nodes.title: TreeShopDroid Android App
nodes.description: Port TreeShop iOS app to Android with Kotlin and Jetpack Compose
nodes.notes:
Based on TreeShop iOS (Swift/SwiftUI) architecture
Target: Android 8.0+ (API 26+)
Tech stack: Kotlin, Jetpack Compose, Room, Maps SDK

nodes.title: Project Setup & Architecture
nodes.description: Initialize Android project with proper structure and dependencies
nodes.notes:
- Create Android Studio project
- Setup Gradle dependencies
- Configure package structure (MVVM)
- Initialize Git repository
- Setup CI/CD pipeline

nodes.title: Core Data Layer
nodes.description: Implement data models and Room database
nodes.notes:
Room Database entities:
- Lead (50+ fields from iOS version)
- User
- Drawing

ViewModels:
- WorkflowManager
- LeadViewModel

Repositories for data access

nodes.title: Map Integration
nodes.description: Implement Google Maps with workflow-colored pins
nodes.notes:
Google Maps SDK for Android
- User location tracking
- Address search/autocomplete
- Custom marker colors by workflow stage
- Map clustering for performance
- Parcel boundary display

nodes.title: UI Components Library
nodes.description: Build reusable Compose components matching iOS design
nodes.notes:
Jetpack Compose components:
- Custom buttons
- Form fields
- Status badges
- Cards
- Navigation drawer
- Loading indicators

Dark mode first design

nodes.title: Lead Management System
nodes.description: 4-stage workflow: Lead → Proposal → Work Order → Invoice
nodes.notes:
Workflow stages:
1. LEAD (Blue)
2. PROPOSAL (Orange)
3. WORK_ORDER (Green)
4. INVOICE (Red)
5. COMPLETED (Gray)

Implement stage transitions and validation

nodes.title: Navigation & Menu
nodes.notes:
Material 3 Navigation Drawer
- Quick action buttons
- Badge counts
- Smooth animations
- Access to all sections
- User profile integration

nodes.title: Gradle Setup
nodes.notes:
Dependencies:
- Compose BOM
- Room
- Maps SDK
- Coroutines
- Hilt (DI)
- Retrofit/Ktor
- DataStore

nodes.title: MVVM Architecture
nodes.description: Setup package structure and base classes
nodes.notes:
Package structure:
- data/
  - models/
  - dao/
  - repository/
- ui/
  - screens/
  - components/
  - theme/
- viewmodel/
- utils/
- di/

nodes.title: Lead Entity
nodes.notes:
Fields from iOS LEAD.swift:
- Customer info
- Property details
- Service requests
- Site visits
- Assignments
- Follow-ups
- Workflow stage
- Timestamps

nodes.title: Google Maps API
nodes.description: Setup Maps SDK and API key
nodes.notes:
- Get API key from Google Cloud Console
- Enable Maps SDK for Android
- Enable Places API
- Add to AndroidManifest.xml
- Configure billing

nodes.title: Theme System
nodes.description: Material 3 dark theme matching iOS design
nodes.notes:
Colors:
- LEAD: Bright Blue (#2196F3)
- PROPOSAL: Orange (#FF9800)
- WORK_ORDER: Green (#4CAF50)
- INVOICE: Red (#F44336)
- COMPLETED: Gray

Dark mode color scheme

nodes.title: Add Lead Form
nodes.description: Compose form for creating new leads
nodes.notes:
Form fields:
- Customer name, email, phone
- Property address (with autocomplete)
- Service type selection
- Priority
- Notes
- Photo capture

Validation and error handling

nodes.title: Authentication
nodes.notes:
- Firebase Auth or custom backend
- Email/password login
- Biometric auth
- Session persistence
- Logout functionality

nodes.title: Offline Support
nodes.notes:
- Room as local database
- WorkManager for background sync
- Conflict resolution strategy
- Network state monitoring
- Queue offline actions

nodes.title: Testing Suite
nodes.description: Unit tests, integration tests, UI tests
nodes.notes:
- JUnit for unit tests
- Mockito/MockK for mocking
- Espresso for UI tests
- Room database testing
- ViewModel testing
- Repository testing
